scripts.test: redis-start && TEST_MODE=local TEST_V1_STATE=true TEST_V2_STATE=true TEST_V1_ADDRESS=true TEST_V2_ADDRESS=true RUST_LOG=forester=debug,forester_utils=debug cargo test --package forester e2e_test -- --nocapture
scripts.test-e2e: RUST_LOG=forester=debug,forester_utils=debug,light_prover_client=debug TEST_MODE="local" TEST_V1_STATE="false" TEST_V2_STATE="true" TEST_V1_ADDRESS="false" TEST_V2_ADDRESS="true" cargo test --package forester e2e_test -- --nocapture
scripts.profile-e2e: redis-start && TEST_MODE=local TEST_V1_STATE=true TEST_V2_STATE=true TEST_V1_ADDRESS=true TEST_V2_ADDRESS=true RUST_LOG=forester=trace,forester_utils=debug,prover_client=debug samply record cargo test --package forester --release e2e_test -- --nocapture
